item.title: Chinese Kinship Calculator
item.description: This is a tool that can flexibly calculate the kinship between Chinese relatives, very practical. Entrance Click here to enter the Chinese Kinship Calculator Tool URL： (Copy) If you encounter problems in the use process, please ask questions in the comment area!

item.title: China Administrative Division Data Query Tool
item.description: This is a tool used to query the relevant content of China’s administrative divisions. In addition, the ID card number resolution tool is built-in. Entrance Click to enter the China Administrative Division Data Query Tool Tool URL： (Copy) If you encounter problems in the use process, please ask questions in the comment area!
